name: bitmagnet
description: BitMagnet is an open-source torrent metadata indexer and DHT crawler that collects and structures BitTorrent data. It includes a web UI for browsing and analyzing torrent metadata, with an option to self-host and extend via API.
features: Torrent Indexer: Collect and structure BitTorrent metadata automatically. Comprehensive indexing.
DHT Crawler: Discover torrents through distributed hash table crawling. Decentralized discovery.
Web Interface: Browse and search torrent metadata through clean UI. Easy exploration.
Metadata Analysis: Analyze and categorize torrent information. Organized data.
API Access: Programmatic access for custom integrations and tools. Extend functionality.
Self-Hosted: Run your own torrent metadata database. Complete control.
Search Functionality: Fast, powerful search across indexed torrents. Find anything quickly.
Cross-Platform: Works on Linux, Windows, macOS, and Android. Universal compatibility.
